title: Champion Master Averages
body: Can you add a feature where it gives you an average overall rating for the champion you play like at the end off a game where it gives you an s+ or s- ect? so that someone just can't play one champion a lot and get the ultimate mastery at level 5 and people think he is great when he does terrible at that champion. So basically something that shows your average rank you achieve in games for that champion using the S,A,B,C,D.

replies.body: The only issue with this is that Riot doesn't wanna show the grade publicly, as that can increase toxicity.
